titles.title: A resolution to allow a witness the right to request a closed session.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XXVI of the Standing rules of the Senate to allow any witness in a committee hearing to make a written request to the chairman, not later than 24 hours in advance of such hearing, to be examined in closed session. Directs such committee to take appropriate action.
